main event: A civilian witnessed a white, glowing, oval object traveling in a slow, steady motion near New Orleans, Louisiana on February 2, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to be noiseless and appeared saucer-shaped., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The case was evaluated as a possible meteor., The object was not tracked on radar despite the report., The sighting resulted in further inquiries from congressional representatives regarding the incident.
